name: api-gestion-app
description: Application de gestion d'entreprises avec frontend React et backend Node.js

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd server && npm install && npm start
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm start" "cd server && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.test:e2e: cd e2e && npx playwright test && node ../generate-test-reports.js
scripts.vercel-build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
